description: Add dialog component using native dialog element
context:
Beads description:
Native modal/dialog using HTML <dialog> element. No JavaScript required for basic show/hide - uses CSS and native dialog behaviors. Should support backdrop styling, open/close animations with @starting-style and allow-discrete, light/dark themes, and integrate with Graffiti's existing .di-dialog styles.
